creator: singh.jasleen@gmail.com
text:
Build an error console and timeline viewer for squiggle. The error console will
display errors, warnings or messages found during the parsing of a document. The
timeline viewer will allow the user to view (and possibly modify) the elements
of an animated svg document.

creator: singh.jasleen@gmail.com
